title: Post Game with Andrea Mitchell: Joe Biden can't stop being Joe Biden
description: NBC News Chief Washington Correspondent Andrea Mitchell joins Chuck for a post-broadcast discussion about the Russian troop buildup and President Biden’s attempt to push voting rights through the Senate.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
